## Express 101 Hello World
::::: {.column-screen-inset}

## Goal

::: {.callout-note collapse="false"}
## Exercise
Modify the app to add "Hello World!" to the main heading. 
Click the play button to run the app.
:::

```{shinylive-python}
#| standalone: true
#| components: [viewer]
#| layout: horizontal
#| viewerHeight: 800
from shiny.express import ui

ui.h1("Hello World!")
```

## Solution

::: {.callout-note collapse="false"}
## Exercise
Modify the app to add "Hello World!" to the main heading. 
Click the play button to run the app.
:::

```{shinylive-python}
#| standalone: true
#| components: [editor, viewer]
#| layout: horizontal
#| viewerHeight: 800
from shiny.express import ui

ui.h1("Hello World!")
```
